title: Analysis of the Effectiveness of Flipped Learning and Communication Tools Based on the 5E Model in Large-Scale Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language education theories and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Application of a Flipped Learning Structure to Language Courses for Smartphone-Primary Working Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design flipped learning activities according to the 5E Model (Engage-Explore-Explain-Elaborate-Evaluate) phases
Learners can compare the characteristics of MIM (Mobile Instant Messenger) and asynchronous forum tools to select context-appropriate communication strategies
Learners can engage in peer feedback and problem-solving discussions with over 80% participation rate in a flipped learning environment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
